features: Artificial Intelligence for Human Detection: Our AI-powered tech precisely recognizes humans, discarding inconsequential motion from cars and trees.

Secure and Reliable Cloud Storage: Our AES-128 encrypted cloud storage with optional subscription (available separately) enhances your experience. A 30-day free trial is available for continuous recording and sharing.
Superior Night Vision: Six IR lights combined with a smart sensor provide high-resolution video recording even in dim conditions, ensuring round-the-clock security.
Resilient IP65 Weather Resistance: With an IP65 rating for dustproof and waterproofing, the doorbell reliably functions in diverse weather conditions, providing year-round security.
Intelligent Motion Alerts: Receive instant notifications on your smartphone upon detecting motion, staying updated on the happenings at your doorstep.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Wireless Doorbell Camera with Free Chime

Intelligence Human Detection Our AI-powered tech precisely recognizes humans, discarding inconsequential motion from cars and trees. Instant 2-Way Communication Connect and interact with visitors from anywhere in real-time. Superior Night Vision Six IR lights combined with a smart sensor provide high-resolution video recording even in dim conditions, ensuring round-the-clock security. Share with Family It supports up to 8 users to access the doorbell. Share the device with your family, so everyone gets access.

Included Free Chime Position the accompanying doorbell chime in various areas for instant alerts. Add multiple chimes to a single doorbell for added utility. Secure Cloud Storage Our AES-128 encrypted cloud storage with optional subscription (available separately) enhances your experience. A 30-day free trial is available. IP65 Weather Resistance With an IP65 rating for dustproof and waterproofing, the doorbell reliably functions in diverse weather conditions, providing year-round security. Simple Wired Setup Follow the setup step, you can install the doorbell camera right away.
Easy to Install Useful Tips:There is insulation tape at the bottom of batteries. Please open the battery door, remove insulation tape, then put the battery back in.

How long will the doorbell camera stay on after a full charge? On a single charge, expect the doorbell camera's battery to last from 1 to 3 months, although frequent recordings and Live View usage can shorten this time, meaning you'll need to recharge more often. Can recorded footage be stored in the cloud? Cloud service subscription is necessary for storing videos, with a trial offered for free. No charges will occur during this period, if you're not pleased, you can freely cancel during the trial if it doesn't fulfill your needs. Is the doorbell camera designed to work on 5GHz Wi-Fi? The doorbell camera can connect only to 2.4GHz Wi-Fi. If your router provides both 2.4GHz and 5GHz, ensure they're named differently and connect to the 2.4GHz network. Do I need an SD card with this doorbell camera? This doorbell camera doesn't need an SD card. It has cloud storage with a free trial. Is the doorbell camera quick to install? Yes, just follow the simple manual.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Product is absolutely amazing
reviews.reviewText: I love how easy it was to install this camera. The installation was less than 10 min. The camera shows clear and precise. The doorbell is loud enough where I can hear the doorbell in any part of the house. Audio isn't muffled like some cameras and I can still get picture activity if I don't subscribe to service. Best purchase for me all year.

reviews.reviewerName: Juan Manuel Lopez FernandezJuan Manuel Lopez Fernandez
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality for its price and excellent costumer service
reviews.reviewText: The installation process is easy and won't take more than 15min. It comes with screws and it also has the option of connecting the device to the wall/door frame with a strong adhesive strip, which is the one I decided to use. The quality is great, and the app interface is user friendly. I highly recommend this product. The only think I would change to make this product perfect is that the chime should have an outlet connection to avoid using a 5V USB port.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Camera was a rebound from the Arlo camera, which no longer functions after the free trail and asks you to open your computer browser to view prices for a subscription to continue to use your camera. I returned that camera right away when I saw it's predatory business practice.After that, I tried out this camera at a fraction of the price and was pleasantly surprised to see that it had most of the same features as the more expensive camera WITHOUT asking you to purchase their subscription. The camera is able to live view and you can preview all of your recordings (photo) on a feed for free.Premium features, however, are locked behind a pay wall ($30/year). These include downloading videos, clicking and viewing the recordings, and access to a cloud storage that keeps up to 30 days of recordings.All features of standard cameras are present, except for an automation to set the camera armed or disarmed with distance or time. It does make a small clicking sound when recording begins that is noticeable to me. However, for $35, this camera is a steal. Adding the $30/year for subscription would take 5 years for it to match the price of a $200 camera!Overall, picture quality is good, form factor is discreet, and I am very pleased with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I just installed the device today. It was very easy to install and all is well. I really love the HD camera view which is very clear. I will probably purchase another one for my rear door.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great product and easy assembly! I had no issues connecting and installing the product. It has awesome video footage and motion detection is sensitive yet accurate.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ease of use
reviews.reviewText: This door bell camera was ease to install and learn how to use. The battery life is amazing and the camera video is clear as can be. Not sure what took me so long to purchase it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product gear price
reviews.reviewText: This is a great video doorbell, and at a great price. Very easy to use as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I got this camera today it was a very easy set up and install. Good picture quality and inexpensive price for cloud storage does everything you need for a great price !
